source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_SEQ_00<tab>The Allied communications officer has a task that can only be performed by a hero of the Alliance.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_SEQ_00<tab>不滅隊駐屯地の同盟軍の連絡将校は、冒険者に依頼したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_SEQ_01<tab>The Allied communications officer informs you that the Alliance garrison at Camp Bluefog is in low spirits and would be better for a hero's visit. Make your way to the camp in northern Thanalan, and make yourself at the disposal of Sergeant Cracked Fist.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_SEQ_01<tab>同盟軍の連絡将校は、各地の兵を冒険者に鼓舞してもらいたいのだという。北ザナラーンのキャンプ・ブルーフォグの「クラックド・フィスト闘曹長」と話そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_SEQ_02<tab>Arriving at Camp Bluefog, you present yourself to Sergeant Cracked Fist, who wastes no time beseeching your help in raising the morale of the garrison. The duty of a hero is truly manifold.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_SEQ_02<tab>キャンプ・ブルーフォグに到着した。「マーチ・オブ・アルコンズ」を成功させるため、兵士たちに声をかけていこう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_TODO_00<tab>Report to Cracked Fist at Camp Bluefog.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_TODO_00<tab>キャンプ・ブルーフォグのクラックド・フィスト闘曹長と話す

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_000<tab>Phase two of the operation is presently in motion. Our brothers and sisters of the Maelstrom are holding their own against Garlean forces upon Vylbrand and the Rhotano Sea. Ere long, the third phase will begin and you must take to the field once more.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_000<tab>君たち「冒険者選抜部隊」には、作戦の第3段階、
そして第4段階を遂行するために、最終決戦地となる、
「カストルム・メリディアヌム」に向かってもらうが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_001<tab>The Immortal Flames shall strike at Castrum Meridianum by way of a diversionary maneuver. While the Garleans are thus locked in battle, you are to infiltrate the stronghold and bring down the magitek field that surrounds the Praetorium.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_001<tab>その道中、ひとつ頼みたいことがある。
「メリディアヌム」に進行がてら、
各地で決戦に備える兵士たちを鼓舞してほしいのだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_002<tab>The staging point for the mission lies in the shadow of Castrum Meridianum in northern Thanalan, and that is where you must go. On your way there, however, I would ask that you make a brief stop at Camp Bluefog, one of our key outposts in the area.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_002<tab>これまで数々の蛮神を倒し、
敵将「リットアティン」をも討った君の言葉を聞けば、
皆の士気も高まるというもの。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_003<tab>The garrison, I am told, is in low spirits, and it would do our troops well to see the hero of Cape Westwind appear before them. For the good of our cause, please stoke the fire in their hearts.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_003<tab>「メリディアヌム」は「北ザナラーン」にある。
まずは「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」に向かってくれ。
……どうか我々を……エオルゼアを導いてほしい……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_005<tab>En route to Castrum Meridianum, please make a brief stop at Camp Bluefog. Our troops there are in low spirits, and it would give them heart if the hero of Cape Westwind were to appear before them.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_KANRIKAN_000_005<tab>まずは「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」に向かってくれ。
……どうか我々を……エオルゼアを導いてほしい……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_CRACKEDFIST_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! Yours is a most welcome presence here at Camp Bluefog!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_CRACKEDFIST_000_010<tab>ようこそ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>隊長！
この「キャンプ・ブルーフォグ」では現在、
決戦に向けての準備を進めております。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_CRACKEDFIST_000_011<tab>Logistically speaking, we are ready to march on Castrum Meridianum at a moment's notice. Alas, while our troops are here in body, their minds are anywhere but.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_CRACKEDFIST_000_011<tab>エオルゼア史上、類を見ない大規模な作戦に、
兵士たちも緊張している様子……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_CRACKEDFIST_000_012<tab>The garrison's mood is dark, so daunting is the prospect of joining what may prove to be the bloodiest battle in history. But with a hero such as you walking among them, we may yet rekindle the dwindling embers within their souls.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC902_01037_CRACKEDFIST_000_012<tab>決戦地「カストルム・メリディアヌム」は目前ですが、
「マーチ・オブ・アルコンズ」を成功させるためにも、
兵士たちに、英雄である隊長の存在感をお示しください！
